items.title: Military community: Build your credit and earn unlimited cash back with Navy Federal Credit Union
items.description: Navy Federal helps the military community build credit and earn rewards. Get unlimited cash back with a secured card designed just for you.

items.title: Swiss unveils new Airbus A350 cabins featuring swanky first-class concept
items.description: Swiss set to launch the new "Swiss Senses" concept, it's next generation cabins for long-haul flights

items.title: Southwest Rapid Rewards Plus credit card review: Modest annual fee plus a handful of benefits
items.description: The Southwest Rapid Rewards Plus card comes with a sign-up bonus and decent airline perks for its $99 annual fee. Here's a closer look at this card.

items.title: Deal of the day: Fly nonstop to Hawaii for just 35K miles
items.description: You can fly nonstop from the northeast to Hawaii for as little as 35,000 American AAdvantage miles or transfer your Citi ThankYou Rewards points.

items.title: Spirit prepares to cut flights as it furloughs, downgrades pilots
items.description: Spirit Airlines confirmed plans to furlough pilots and downgrade captains this fall, as the airline prepares to shrink its network in an effort to tur...
